list.description:
#help - if you can inform me on the leopard 2k's roof 20mm, "triggerGroup", "bulletType", and speed as well that'll be very helpful as I do not know.
A rather complex sight for the Leopard series (that I currently have access to). They all work the same (demonstrated on the Leopard I).
Built for all ammunition types, the top dart round is set as the main. Has a distance measurement based on 2.4m of height, deflection lead for 20 and 40 km/h.
inspired by https://live.warthunder.com/post/719836/en/ and I plan to make this work with all the leopards.

#leopard #leopard1 #leoparda1a1 #leopar...

Leopard 2a4 semi realistic sight
레오파르트 2a4 픽션 조준경

#leopard_2a4 #realistic #semi_realistic #historical

For sight for T-72AV (TURMs-T) inspired by https://live.warthunder.com/post/902605/en/
It is built for the 3BM42 shell, however, it can be retrofitted for the others in the .blk file.
IMPORTANT you must set your mouse wheel to sight distance control with a multiplier of 43% or the flying time and penetration will break (Controls/Ground vehicles/Camera control).
#t72avturmst #t72av #t72

Sight for T-72AV (TURMS-T) for simulator battles. With a simple trajectory for APFSDS up to 300 meters.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change colour for the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

...

Universal Modern Sight version 2.1 - Minimalistic version for IFVs

  • This version is minimalistic version of my UMTS 2.0 (https://live.warthunder.com/post/987161/en/). I designed this to be used on #BMP-2 , but it'll work on any other vehicle as well
  • This is a #fictional #modern and #universal custom tank sight v2.1 made by me. It works on #alltanks , however I recommend you to use it on #ifv and #bmp_2 tanks , as it was designed for them.
  • Zip file contains 2 sights with different default colours - black and orang...

Made by AkulaV
https://www.twitch.tv/akulav_

New version of my sight is available here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1020556/en/

Description
I created this custom universal sight for myself because I hated the stock sight and wanted something simple + high contrast. My twitch viewers started asking me if they can download this sight, so I decided to share it on WT Live. Hope you find the custom sight useful and let me know if you have any feedback!

Custom Sight Features:

  1. Universal sight works with any tank (including SPAA)
  2. High con...

UNIVERSAL MODERN TANK SIGHT version 2.0

  • This version is simplified, looks cleaner, and contains 3 different colour schemes by default (normal black, green, and orange, + white when lit up)
  • This is a #fictional #modern and #universal custom tank sight v2.0 made by me. It works on #alltanks , however I recommend you to use it on #toptier tanks only, as it was designed for them.
  • Zip file contains 3 sights with different default colours - black, green, and orange, but these colours can be easily modified in the fi...

Improved v2.0 here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/987161/en/

  • This is a #fictional #modern and #universal custom tank sight made by me. It works on #alltanks , but I recommend to use it on #toptier tanks only, as it was designed for them.
  • Original colours are orange by default and white when iluminated, but that can be easily modified in the file - you can change it to whatever colours you want.

I hope that you will like it! Enjoy!

Доброго времени суток! Реставрация очередного прицела завершена.

Была обновлены:

  1. Были добавлены цифры к вертикальным рискам по правую сторону.
  2. Сам прицел был немного расширен, дабы цифры не путались с линиями.
  3. Была добавлена вторая прицельная сетка, адаптированая для техники с иной оптикой.



А на этом всё! Удачи в боях!
#universal
#historical
#sight

Доброго вечера! Данная немецкая прицельная сетка подходит для любого вида техники, но может не всегда корректно отображаться. Проблема в том, что данную проблему никак не исправить. Если какая-то прицельная сетка не подойдёт к конкретной технике, то попробуйте другую. В архиве их две.
Был добвлен эффект виньетирования на первый прицел для большей атмосферы. А на сегодня всё! Удачи в сражениях!
#universal
#historical
#sight

Доброго времени суток! Доработка прицела от Т-34 завершена и успешно прошла тестирование. Прицел является универсальным, но с одним условием: если не подойдёт один - попробуйте другой. В архиве их два.

Было обновлено:

Добавлены цифры к вертикальным рискам по правую сторону

Буду благодарен, если отпишитесь по поводу ошибок. Если понравился - скачивай, ставь и удачи в сражениях!
#universal
#historical
#sight

M3 and M3A3 Bradley IFV Historical Gunner Sight

Suitable for both #M3 and #M3A3 #Bradley. Reticle lighting is always on

With white crosshair colour available, it's finally looking more like the real thing!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GjfvG36NhNQ

Two Versions
V1 = Green lighting
V2 = White lighting

2077 themed sights for 10.x MBTs.

Works for:

FR: Leclerc S1/S2

GER: Leopard 2A5/2A6

ITA: C1 ariete, Centauro MGS, Dardo

SWE: Strv 122A

UK: Challenger 2F

US: M1A2

RU: T-72B3, T-80BVM, T-80U, T-90A

Schindibee's fictional "FELIS" Sight for Swedish IKV 91

#customsight #sight #fictional #felis #sweden #ikv91 #ikv_91

This is a fully fictional sight for the Swedish IKV 91 light tank, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo (HEAT-FS)
- Deflection shooting lines for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Black daylight and green night colour crosshairs
- Optimized/simplified for use with laser rangefinder

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder...

日本Ho-Ro (JP)


https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1jo4y1y7ZN?p=2

#sight #fictional #cute #horo

This is a sight for IL-28Sh specifically for SK24 rockets. It isn't 100% accurate, especially at 1000m mark. I suggest attacking at 30 to 60 degree angles. I will test it more later and update this post if I find any flaws.

Realistic sight for French and Israelian tank AML-90 + ELAN 90 Mk7

Preference use with standard sniper view due the tank not have automatic parallaxe correction.

Zip file contain:
-Folder of vehicles
-Sight file in each folder

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-viseur-personalise/3448


#aml #aml90 #sight #historical

Adds Hana Isuzu from Girls und Panzer to your tank sight, as well as some sweet encouraging words.

Works for all tank's sight, works with crosshair lighting as well. (Instructions included in file)

Creating this took a hell of alot of time and effort, but was definitely worth it. I hope she brings you as much joy as she did to me.

#girls_und_panzer #girlsundpanzer #isuzuhana #sight #anime

由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】
此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Due to the change of sight scale of some top-level vehicles in the new ver...

#t72b3 #t80bvm #t90a #2s25m #t80u #t80uk #sosna_u #thermal (aparently few different russian thermals have the same reticle)

IMPORTANT: Manually adjusting distance in top tier is pointless so this sight does NOT feature manual distance numbers, only rangefinder numbers, this sight will not help you if you do not have thermals nor rangefinder

This is as good as the thermal channel for the more recent russian FCS's (like Sosna-U) can look like in WT atm... as there are some limitations to custom sights in WT that make it impossible to make it look ...

Historical and realistically sized reticle for the M247 Sergeant York.

The sight was designed to help the gunner lase a target, the small circle is 0.5 mils and showed the diameter of the laser for ground targets, the big circle is 3 mils in diameter and illustrates the diameter of the laser used for lasing air targets.

The horizontal lines are 2 mils apart.

The double lines inside the large circle are 0.25 mils apart.

Hand made by me, STGN :D

#historical #sight #m247 #m247_sergeant_york
